DOC.brief_title: Analysis of Palliative Surgery in View of Quality of Life and Prognosis
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose of this study is to find out if palliative surgery in patients with cancer improves quality of life and prognosis. There will be a scheduled assessment of quality of life and assessment of postoperative complications. prognostic scoring will be performed before surgical intervention.
DOC.criteria: clinical diagnosis of inoperable cancer planned surgery able to give interview written informed consent unconsciousness psychiatric disorder not able to communicate in German
